exercise.title: DOM Manipulation

p.i: In this exercise, you show a new image on the HTML page when the user clicks a button.

ol.li: Add a new button tag to your HTML document. The text shown on the button should be "Add image". When the user clicks the button the function addImg() should be called.
Add a <div> element below the button. The id of the element should be "images".
In your JavaScript code, write a function called addImg(). When the function is called it should add a new Haaga-Helia logo in the images <div>.

exercise.p: Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
